      @RequestMapping(path="/register", method=POST, produces="application/json;charset=UTF-8") public String register(@RequestParam("username") String username, @RequestParam("password") String password, @RequestParam("campusnum") Long campusNum, @RequestParam("email") String email)

      password - password
      campusNum - campusNum
      email - email

      @RequestMapping(path="/activation/{userId}/{code}", method=GET, produces="application/json;charset=UTF-8") public String activation(@PathVariable("userId") int userId, @PathVariable("code") String code)
